results.title: Simplus Electric Cooker With Steamer Multicooker Hot Pot Frying Pan Soup Pot Multifunctional Non-Sticky Portable
results.description:
⭐ Who Are We
Simplus provides high quality home appliances for all customers in South East Asia. We produce well-designed, reliable, easy-to-use and cost-effective smart products to make life up easily. From personal healthy to home improvement, we help you make the most out of every day.

⭐ Product Intro
Simplus electric cooker is your perfect choice for cooking meals or snacks when a full range is not available. Two temperature settings to cook a variety of foods such as hot pot, noodles, boil water, make soup, cook pasta and vegetables, etc. The detachable power cord and small scale in size make it very portable. Ideal for dorm rooms, offices, camping, or even your RV. Non-stick ceramic coating for easy cleaning. With safety features such as overheating protection and cool-touch double wall design. Visible cover to monitor the process of the food during cooking. It's both great for everyday use or as an extra cooking appliance in a busy kitchen.

⭐ Basic Info
· Model: DZGH003WH01-S
· Powder: 630w
· Coating: Ceramic
· Capacity: 1.5L
· Two Temperature Levels
· Accessories: Steamer
· Visible cover
· Power-off Protection
· Dimension: 25.2*21.3*22.4

⭐ How To Clean
1. Add warm water and dish soap  into the pot. Leave it for a few minutes.
2.  Pour out the water, and use wet sponge to rub the stain.
3. Rinse with running water.

☑ Thoroughly clean the area where it comes into contact with food

☑ When there is no object in the juice cup, do not start it, which may cause damage
